resources.string: Turn VirtualSoftKey\'s service on or off, Remember if the service is off you cannot use Soft Key Bar in your app.\n Remember, We care about users privacy and do not collect any data from users, this is an open source project and you can find the URL for the project on the main page.
In order for app to work properly and show the navigation bar (Soft Key Bar) you need to allow the permissions to draw over other apps. \nSettings > Apps > Advanced > Draw over other apps
And then enable the Accessibility service. \nSettings > Accessibility > VirtualSoftKeys
Please allow draw over apps permission
"Please allow this permission first , and select VirtualSoftKeys in accessibility"
"Please allow draw over apps permission first"
Swiping up in touch view for opening the Softkey bar,then swiping down can cancel
Rotating screen for changing the portrait or landscape config ,they are independent value in every config
Service seem has some problem , please help me to open VirtualSoftKeys in accessibility again!
